title: Lentil Based Chicken Curry
ingredients: ['Lentil Base gravy', '2 tbsp ghee or veg oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '4 cloves of garlic', '1 tsp turmeric', '1 tsp cumin', '1 tsp coriander', '1/2 tsp asafoetida if you have it', 'pinch of mustard seeds', '1" piece of fresh ginger (optional)', '1/4 pint by volume of split peas and red lentils (mixed 50/50) - washed in several changes of cold water, and soaked for as long as you can - min 1 hr of pref 4 hours to overnight', '1 pint hot water, or better still veg stock', 'The Curry', '1 tbsp ghee or veg oil', '2 onions, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, crushed and chopped', '2 medium chicken breasts, cubed', '1 tsp cumin', '1 tsp coriander', '1 tsp turmeric', 'large pinch black onion seeds', 'your favourite curry paste/powder to taste']
